# Important notice
Here, instead of using APBS version 1.5 like original MaSIF, we used APBS 3.4.1.

Please go to [APBS GitHub repo](https://github.com/Electrostatics/apbs/tree/main?tab=readme-ov-file) and download `APBS-3.4.1.Linux.zip`.

Then, please put your `APBS-3.4.1.Linux.zip` file and decompress it here.
